DOC.brief_summary: This study continuation pivotal trial study safety efficacy Relay thoracic stent-graft system treat thoracic aortic aneurysm . Efficacy evaluate device-related adverse event rate endovascular repair ( via Relay thoracic stent-graft ) 1 year . Safety evaluate compare major adverse event 1 year subject treat Relay thoracic stent-graft underwent surgical repair .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Clinical Study Safety Efficacy Relay Thoracic Stent-Graft
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnose descend thoracic aneurysm penetrate ulcer Subjects whose anatomy accommodate Relay device Subjects consent participate Subjects agree followup schedule Subjects lesions thoracic aneurysm penetrate ulcer Subjects less 1 year life expectancy Subjects pregnant Subjects medical condition wold complicate endovascular procedure confound result ( e.g. , Marfan 's syndrome , morbid obesity , severe coronary artery disease ) Subjects participate another investigational study
